title: Workshop on Designing Web-Based Motivational Elements

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers, involving analysis of motivational factors and website prototype development through project execution by current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain five or more motivational elements in website design
Learners can analyze factors influencing user preferences using a repeated measures design
Learners can develop a website prototype with applied motivational elements through project-based assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
